Package org.xbmc.android.remote.business

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractManager
    Super class of the wrappers, keeps common code.
    AbstractThread
    Super class for all the cache threads.
    CacheManager  
    Command<T>
    Class to asynchronous execute backend stuff and send the result back to the GUI.
    ControlManager
    Asynchronously wraps the InfoClient class.
    DiskCacheThread
    This thread asynchronously delivers sdcard-cached bitmaps.
    DownloadThread
    This thread asynchronously downloads thumbs from XBMC and returns them as Bitmap.
    EventClientManager
    Super class of the wrappers, keeps common code.
    InfoManager
    Asynchronously wraps the InfoClient class.
    ManagerFactory  
    ManagerThread
    Spawned on first access, then looping.
    MemCacheThread
    This thread asynchronously delivers memory-cached bitmaps.
    MusicManager
    Asynchronously wraps the InfoClient class.
    NowPlayingPollerThread
    Activities (and other stuff) can subscribe to this thread in order to obtain real-time "Now playing" information.
    TvShowManager  
    VideoManager
    Asynchronously wraps the VideoClient class.
